name: Fall 2016 - 470 - Cowboy vs Aliens
description:
All donations go directly to the Computer Graphics Club at Chico State, less a 10% donation to Itch.IO for hosting services

Clint Star, the most fierce Cowboy in the land, and his horse Bessy have been abducted by aliens! He must shoot his way through the alien spaceship to reunite with his beloved Bessy and exit through the escape pod. Using his plasma revolver, Clint must eradicate the frustrated aliens while picking up valuable power ups and loot along the way. Fight through levels of intense shoot em' up action and save your steed in Cowboy vs Aliens!

To Run: Extract Zipped Folder (CowboyVsAliens), Open WindowsNoEditor Folder, Double Click CowboyVsAliens executable.
